mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_note_log_info( MOBILEPHONE,SEND_START,RETURNED_VALUE,VISIT_IP,CHANNEL_TYPE,SNDE_TIME,NOTE_CONTENT,CREATE_TIME,COMPANY_ID, event_from,kind )VALUES( #{phoneNum}, #{sendStart}, #{returnedValue}, #{requestIp}, #{channelType}, sysdate(), #{content}, sysdate(), #{companyId}, #{eventFrom}, #{kind} )
